bibl.title: The Old Testament Pseudepigrapha. II. Expansions of the Old Testament and Legends, Wisdom and Philosophical Literature, Prayers, Psalms and Odes, fragments of Lost Judeo-Hellenistic Works.
bibl.note: Pp. 427-442: P. Chester Beatty XVI (Apocryphon of Jannes and Jambres).
bibl.seg: Charlesworth James H., The Old Testament Pseudepigrapha. II. Expansions of the Old Testament and Legends, Wisdom and Philosophical Literature, Prayers, Psalms and Odes, fragments of Lost Judeo-Hellenistic Works.
Garden City, NJ - London, Doubleday - Darton, Longman and Todd, 1985, 1006 pp.
